_header: Why was I crowned and made heaven queen

RylandsLat395.First Lines:
Why was I crowned and made hevyn queeneWhy was I called of mercy
                    the welleWhy shuld I an erthely woman beneSo high in hevyn above an
                    angell…
RylandsLat395.Last Lines:
…I was ordeyned to save the from helleTo blisse there to abide
                    for evirmoreQuia amore langueo
